name: Anua Heartleaf Pore Control Cleansing Oil
Nature Republic Aloe Vera 92% Soothing Gel
Benton Snail Bee High Content content
Pich Pisey Bikini Moisture Cream
howToUse: Cleanse the area thoroughly before application.
Take a pea-sized amount of the cream.
Gently massage into the skin until fully absorbed.
Use twice daily (morning and night) for best results.
description: Reveal your confidence with the Pich Pisey Bikini Moisture Cream. This specialized formula is designed to hydrate, brighten, and smooth delicate skin. Infused with gentle nourishing ingredients, it helps reduce dark spots and irritation while providing deep moisture.

name: Phka Blush (Pkor Lorn)
howToUse: Swirl a brush into the powder.
Tap off excess product.
Smile and apply to the apples of your cheeks.
Blend upwards towards your temples for a lifted look.
description: Add a pop of natural color to your complexion with Phka Blush. The silky-smooth powder blends effortlessly into the skin, creating a soft-focus finish that lasts all day. Available in a universally flattering shade that suits all skin tones.

name: Phka Blush (Kolab)
howToUse: Best applied with a fluffy blush brush.
Start light and build up intensity.
Perfect for a 'cold girl' makeup look.
description: The Kolab shade offers a stunning rosy pink hue that gives your cheeks a fresh, blooming appearance. Inspired by the beauty of roses (Kolab), this blush provides a romantic flush of color.

name: Phka Blush (Chhuk)
howToUse: Dip brush into powder.
Smile to find apples of cheeks.
Sweep upwards for a fresh look.
description: Chhuk (Lotus) brings a vibrant pop of color to your cheeks. This lively shade embodies the energy and beauty of the lotus flower, perfect for brightening up any makeup look.

name: Phka Blush (Romduol)
howToUse: Apply to cheeks for a warm glow.
Can also be used as eyeshadow.
Build up for a more intense sunset look.
description: Inspired by the Romduol, Cambodia's national flower, this unique yellowish-orange shade provides a stunning sun-kissed warmth to your complexion. Perfect for warm undertones or creating a trendy monochromatic look.

name: Phka Blush (Tirk Dos)
howToUse: Apply under cheekbones for a contoured look.
Use as a transition shade for eyeshadow.
Blend well for a seamless natural flush.
description: Tirk Dos offers a sophisticated warm terracotta nude shade. Perfect for a natural everyday look or for adding warmth and definition to the face (like a soft bronzer/blush hybrid).

name: Phka Blush (Angkeadey)
howToUse: Use a light hand as it is very pigmented.
Tap onto cheeks and blend quickly.
Can create a 'drunk blush' or 'sunburn' look.
description: Angkeadey delivers a rich, deep berry red hue. This bold shade allows for a dramatic flush, perfect for evening looks or for those who love a striking pop of color.

name: Phka Malis Lip Oil
howToUse: Apply directly to bare lips for a glossy look.
Layer over lipstick for added shine.
Use daily for hydration.
description: Inspired by the fragrant Jasmine flower (Malis), this crystal-clear lip oil provides intense hydration with a non-sticky, glass-like finish. Infused with subtle shimmer particles to make your lips look plump and juicy.

name: Phka Romyol Lip Oil
howToUse: Swipe on lips for a sheer red tint.
Apply multiple layers for more color payoff.
Perfect for a 'clean girl' makeup look.
description: Named after the vibrant Hibiscus (Romyol), this tinted lip oil gives your lips a juicy, sheer red glaze. It combines the shine of a gloss with the nourishment of an oil for the perfect healthy lip glow.

name: Phka Trabekprei Lip Oil
howToUse: Apply the blue oil to bare lips.
Watch it magically transform to pink.
The shade adjusts to your unique pH.
description: Experience magic with Trabekprei (Wild Guava). This transparent blue oil transforms into a personalized soft pink shade upon contact with your lips, adjusting to your unique pH level.

name: Pich Pisey Armpit Cream
howToUse: Apply a small amount to clean, dry underarms.
Massage gently until fully absorbed.
Use twice daily (morning & night) for best results.
description: Achieve smooth, bright, and confident underarms with Pich Pisey Armpit Cream. This specialized formula targets chicken skin, dark spots, and roughness, leaving your skin soft and evenly toned. Perfect for sleeveless days!

name: Peptide 3R Derma Eye Serum
description: A premium wrinkle-care eye serum formulated with peptides to rejuvenate and firm the delicate skin around your eyes.
howToUse: Apply a small amount around the eye area.
Gently tap with fingertips until absorbed.
Use morning and night for best results.
ingredients: Water, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Peptide Complex, Adenosine, Niacinamide...

name: Luminous Damage Repair Treatment
description: Intensive hair treatment that restores shine and smoothness to damaged hair.
howToUse: Apply as directed on packaging.
Suitable for daily use.

name: Ceramide Repair Foot Cream
description: Rich foot cream with ceramides to heal and soften dry, cracked heels.
howToUse: Apply as directed on packaging.
Suitable for daily use.

description: Balancing toner enriched with rice extract to brighten and refine skin texture.
howToUse: Apply as directed on packaging.
Suitable for daily use.

name: Naturie Hatomugi Skin Conditioner
description: This mild Naturie Hatomugi Skin Conditioner contains coix seed extract derived from natural plants to moisture, brighten and smoothen your skin. It prepares your skin to better absorb skincare products layered on after.
howToUse: Apply a generous amount onto your skin.
Gently blend it in with your hands until fully absorbed.
Can also be used as a face mask or body care.
ingredients: Water, DPG, BG, Glycerin, Glycyrrhizic acid 2K, Hatomugi extract (Coix Seed), (Styrene/Acrylate) copolymer, Ethanol, Citric acid...

name: Anessa Perfect UV Sunscreen Skincare Milk
description: The gold standard of sun protection. Anessa Perfect UV Sunscreen Skincare Milk offers the strongest UV protection with a smooth, non-sticky milky texture. Features Aqua Booster EX Technology which gets stronger coming into contact with sweat or water.
howToUse: Shake well before use.
Apply generously to face and neck as the last step of skincare.
Reapply fast after sweating or swimming.
ingredients: Water, Dimethicone, Zinc Oxide, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Alcohol, Cyclopentasiloxane...

name: Skin Aqua Super Moisture Gel Pump Type SPF50+/PA++++
description: A fresh, water-like sensation sunscreen gel. Skin Aqua Super Moisture Gel contains 4 moisturizing ingredients including Super Hyaluronic Acid and Collagen to keep skin hydrated while providing strong UV protection.
howToUse: Apply evenly to the skin.
Recommended to reapply frequently to maintain protection.
Can be removed with soap.
ingredients: Water, Ethanol, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, BG, Diphenylsiloxy Phenyl Trimethicone, Sodium Hyaluronate...

name: Naturie Hatomugi Skin Conditioning Gel
description: A lightweight, non-sticky moisturizing gel containing Job's Tears (Hatomugi) extract. Deeply hydrates skin and locks in moisture without feeling heavy. Can be used on face and body.
howToUse: Use as a moisturizer after lotion.
Can be used as a moisturizing pack by applying a thick layer.
Suitable for face and body.
ingredients: Water, Glycerin, DPG, Dimethicone, Ascorbyl Tetraisopalmitate, Sodium Tocopheryl Phosphate, Coix Lacryma-Jobi Ma-yuen Seed Extract...

name: Black Sheep Booster Whitening Body Cream
description: A premium whitening body booster cream. Helps to brighten skin tone and reduce dark spots effectively.
howToUse: Apply daily to body after shower.
Focus on dark areas or spots.

name: Justeen Miracle Massaya Whitening Set
description: A complete 3-in-1 body whitening set containing: Booster Whitening Cream (100g), Whitening Body Lotion (500g), and Vitamin Body Serum (300ml).
howToUse: Mix the serum and lotion together for best results.
Apply the booster cream on dark spots.
Use daily after shower.
ingredients: Vitamin C, Alpha Arbutin, Glutathione, Collagen, Hyaluronic Acid...

name: Hada Labo Koi-Gokujyun UV White Gel SPF50+ PA++++
description: A multi-functional UV gel that acts as a lotion, beauty serum, emulsion, cream, and mask. Provides strong SPF50+ protection while hydrating the skin with Hyaluronic Acid and Vitamin C.
